overview.en: NewStar aims to transform the underlying economic system of the entertainment industry through blockchain technology, and re-architect a decentralized sub-ledger and settlement system, so as to conduct the depositing, confirmation, storage, distribution and asset securitization of valuable contents generated by the entertainment industry.
overview.zh: NewStar旨在通过区块链技术改造文娱行业底层经济体系，并重新架构一套去中心化分账及结算系统，为文娱行业所产生的有价值内容进行存证、确权、存储及分发与资产证券化处理。
